product.title: Mini Lollipop Giraffe Family
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • About these Mini Lollipop Giraffe Charms

    Size: 12CM / 4.7IN (not including loop)

    Our adorable, much-loved Lollipop Giraffes are now available in mini charm sizes for you to bring on the go! This charm comes with a sturdy string loop and a trusty suction cup. Perfect for keychains and house decorations (i.e. on the fridge or as a cute window display), you can brighten up your life with our colorful mini Giraffe charms!

    The perfect gift for your loved ones!

    Our adorable mini plushie charms make for the perfect gift for birthdays, anniversaries, and every other special occasion you can think of! 🥰🎁 You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our charms, so leave an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with a super cute plushie charm today. 💖

    Features

    ✨ Filled with 100% premium quality cotton
    🤩 Suction cup to attach to most hard surfaces
    💖 Promotes relaxation with its unbelievably soft material
    😊 Allergy-free and asthma friendly

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 3 years old

    Charm sizes:

    Measurements may be off by 1-3cm due to the nature of how PP cotton expands and compresses. The size and filling will vary depending on how the charm is packaged.

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the charms filled with? All our charms are filled with High-Quality Premium PP Cotton with an outer layer so soft you won't want to stop hugging it.

    Can I wash my charm?     Yes, you can by following these 5 simple steps:

    Step 1:     Use the gentlest cycle available on your washing machine.
    Step 2: Wash your charm in cold water using a mild detergent.
    Step 3: If disinfecting is a concern, use warm water or consider using a product like Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, which is safe on both whites and colors, unlike chlorine bleach.
    Step 4: Place the charm in a launderable mesh bags or duvet cover. Padding the drum of the washer with towels can also add another layer of protection. Recommended!
    Step 5: Air-drying will be the gentlest choice, and a hairdryer turned on low heat can help to fluff up the fur once the charm has reached the just-damp stage (think of it as a finishing touch!)

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
